welcome_message_body: Welcome to Yachimata, a charming city known for its beautiful traditional architecture, stunning natural landscapes, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Yachimata has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Narita Airport's main terminal, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Narita Airport's second terminal, primarily used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Narita Airport's newest terminal, exclusively used by low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport with unlimited usage.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Haneda Airport, serving airlines such as Japan Airlines, ANA, and Delta.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Haneda Airport, serving airlines such as Skymark Airlines, Jetstar Japan, and StarFlyer.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection every 3 hours.
